response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by its creators, reflecting its unique features and the extensive resources invested in its development. Given its rarity and exclusivity, it's not often available on the market. I believe this investment could greatly benefit you, providing unparalleled value and utility. Please consider my offer to purchase this product for $15,000. I look forward to discussing how this could enhance your life or business.", "product_price": 15000}
